data.title: LeBron James, Dwyane Wade's Wife and Shaquille O'Neal's Ex Show Love as Savannah James Blows Own Trumpet After 37th Birthday
data.meta_description: LeBron James, Dwyane Wade's wife, and Shaquille O'Neal's ex-wife take a moment to appreciate Savannah James on her 37th birthday.
data.text:
NBA fans love to get the feeling of staying involved with a superstar’s life. Thus, whenever they get a glimpse into their personal lives, they never miss an opportunity to let it go. Something similar happened recently as Savannah James, wife of LeBron James, celebrated her birthday with millions of fans.

Later, various celebrity friends of hers joined the 37th birthday occasion. Dwyane Wade‘s wife and Shaquille O’Neal‘s ex-partner showered their love and LeBron himself topped it off with his gesture for his spouse.

What did LeBron James do to show love to his wife?

ADVERTISEMENT

Article continues below this ad

Savannah has been hyping her birthday month up for the last few days. In all those moments, the Los Angeles Lakers star showed his support for her. In this month of Virgo, she celebrated her special day on the 27th of August. A recent post of her raising a toast to herself became public as fans and friends alike joined forces to show support.

Dwyane’s partner, Gabrielle Union, commented, “Happy Birthday,” with a heart emoji to show her admiration. Shaq’s ex-wife and television personality, Shaunie Henderson, said the same thing. La La Anthony, amongst others, also joined the celebration stating, “Happy birthday Vannah‼️”

The best gift, though, came from her husband.

LeBron, rather than commenting on her post, decided to share it. He put the post on his Instagram story to display his love for his partner. He topped it off with a heart, showering affection for the love of his life.

The relationship of a lifetime

The four-time NBA champion’s relationship with his wife stood the test of time on numerous occasions. The high school sweethearts grew together to set an example for modern-day celebrity couples.

Despite all the drama around James, their marriage has lasted a decade and is still going strong. The couple has raised three wonderful kids, keeping them well off of the otherwise-usual controversies throughout their lives.

So, Savannah deserves all the admiration she gets from her husband, acquaintances and fans alike. A strong lady by the side of a determined man – the journey continues. Cheers, Savannah!
